languages.text: "Каждое утро я обращался ко Всеотцу, а каждый вечер — к Рассу. Я тренировал свое тело, читал литании, а в самые трудные часы повторял свою сагу. Вспоминал каждую битву, каждую рану, каждого брата. И так я выжил". {n}Свирепо зыркнув на вас, рыжеволосый отворачивается.{/n} "Я всегда выживаю".

"Every morning I made entreaties to the Allfather, and every night I appealed to Russ. I trained my body, read the litanies, and in the darkest moments, I recited my own saga. I recalled every battle, every wound, every brother. And that is how I survived." {n}The red-haired Space Wolf fixes you with a fierce glower and then turns away.{/n} "I always survive."
languages.original_text: "Каждое утро я обращался ко Всеотцу, а каждый вечер — к Рассу. Я тренировал свое тело, читал литании, а в самые трудные часы повторял свою сагу. Вспоминал каждую битву, каждую рану, каждого брата. И так я выжил". {n}Свирепо зыркнув на вас, рыжеволосый отворачивается.{/n} "Я всегда выживаю".

I recalled every battle, every wound, every brother. And that is how I survived." {n}The red-haired Space Wolf fixes you with a fierce glower and then turns away.{/n} "I always survive."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “每天早晨，我都向万能的全父祈求。每天晚上，我都向鲁斯祈祷。我锻炼身体，不断祈祷。在最黑暗的那段日子里，我会颂唱我自己的史诗。我会回忆起我过去的每场战斗、每处伤口、每位兄弟。我就是这么活下来的。”{n}这位红发太空野狼用凶狠的目光注视着你，之后转过了头。{/n}“我总是能活下来。”
languages.original_text: "Every morning I made entreaties to the Allfather, and every night I appealed to Russ. I trained my body, read the litanies, and in the darkest moments, I recited my own saga. I recalled every battle, every wound, every brother. And that is how I survived." {n}The red-haired Space Wolf fixes you with a fierce glower and then turns away.{/n} "I always survive."

traits.locale_text: “每天早晨，我都向万能的全父祈求。每天晚上，我都向鲁斯祈祷。我锻炼身体，不断祈祷。在最黑暗的那段日子里，我会颂唱我自己的史诗。我会回忆起我过去的每场战斗、每处伤口、每位兄弟。我就是这么活下来的。”{n}这位红发太空野狼用凶狠的目光注视着你，之后转过了头。{/n}“我总是能活下来。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Cada mañana suplicaba al Padre de todas las cosas y cada noche rogaba a Russ. Entrenaba mi cuerpo, recitaba las letanías y, en mis momentos más oscuros, recitaba mi propia saga. Recordaba cada batalla, cada herida y a cada hermano. Así fue como sobreviví». {n}El pelirrojo Lobo Espacial te lanza una mirada ardiente y se gira.{/n} «Siempre sobrevivo».
languages.original_text: "Every morning I made entreaties to the Allfather, and every night I appealed to Russ. I trained my body, read the litanies, and in the darkest moments, I recited my own saga. I recalled every battle, every wound, every brother. And that is how I survived." {n}The red-haired Space Wolf fixes you with a fierce glower and then turns away.{/n} "I always survive."

traits.locale_text: «Cada mañana suplicaba al Padre de todas las cosas y cada noche rogaba a Russ. Entrenaba mi cuerpo, recitaba las letanías y, en mis momentos más oscuros, recitaba mi propia saga. Recordaba cada batalla, cada herida y a cada hermano. Así fue como sobreviví». {n}El pelirrojo Lobo Espacial te lanza una mirada ardiente y se gira.{/n} «Siempre sobrevivo».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「毎朝、俺は全知の父に懇願し、毎晩、ラスに訴えた。体を鍛え、典礼を読み、最も暗い時には自分のサーガを朗読した。すべての戦い、すべての傷、すべての兄弟を思い出した。そうやって生き残ったんだ」{n}赤毛のスペースウルフは厳しい眼差しであなたを見つめ、そして背を向ける。{/n}「俺はいつも生き残ってきた」
languages.original_text: "Every morning I made entreaties to the Allfather, and every night I appealed to Russ. I trained my body, read the litanies, and in the darkest moments, I recited my own saga. I recalled every battle, every wound, every brother. And that is how I survived." {n}The red-haired Space Wolf fixes you with a fierce glower and then turns away.{/n} "I always survive."

traits.locale_text: 「毎朝、俺は全知の父に懇願し、毎晩、ラスに訴えた。体を鍛え、典礼を読み、最も暗い時には自分のサーガを朗読した。すべての戦い、すべての傷、すべての兄弟を思い出した。そうやって生き残ったんだ」{n}赤毛のスペースウルフは厳しい眼差しであなたを見つめ、そして背を向ける。{/n}「俺はいつも生き残ってきた」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Jeden Morgen habe ich den Allvater angefleht, jeden Abend an Russ appelliert. Ich habe meinen Körper trainiert, habe die Litaneien gelesen und habe in den dunkelsten Augenblicken meine eigene Saga rezitiert. Ich habe mich an jede Schlacht erinnert, jede Wunde, jeden Bruder. Und so habe ich überlebt." {n}Der rothaarige Space Wolf fixiert dich mit einem zornigen Blick und wendet sich dann ab.{/n} "Ich überlebe immer."
languages.original_text: "Every morning I made entreaties to the Allfather, and every night I appealed to Russ. I trained my body, read the litanies, and in the darkest moments, I recited my own saga. I recalled every battle, every wound, every brother. And that is how I survived." {n}The red-haired Space Wolf fixes you with a fierce glower and then turns away.{/n} "I always survive."

traits.locale_text: "Jeden Morgen habe ich den Allvater angefleht, jeden Abend an Russ appelliert. Ich habe meinen Körper trainiert, habe die Litaneien gelesen und habe in den dunkelsten Augenblicken meine eigene Saga rezitiert. Ich habe mich an jede Schlacht erinnert, jede Wunde, jeden Bruder. Und so habe ich überlebt." {n}Der rothaarige Space Wolf fixiert dich mit einem zornigen Blick und wendet sich dann ab.{/n} "Ich überlebe immer."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Chaque matin, je priais le Père de Tous, et chaque nuit, j'en appelais à Russ. J'ai entraîné mon corps, j'ai lu les litanies, et dans les moments les plus sombres, j'ai récité ma propre saga. Je me suis rappelé de chaque bataille, de chaque blessure, de chaque frère. Et c'est ce qui m'a permis de survivre. » {n}Le Space Wolf aux cheveux roux vous fixe d'un regard noir avant de se détourner.{/n} « Je survis à chaque fois. »
languages.original_text: "Every morning I made entreaties to the Allfather, and every night I appealed to Russ. I trained my body, read the litanies, and in the darkest moments, I recited my own saga. I recalled every battle, every wound, every brother. And that is how I survived." {n}The red-haired Space Wolf fixes you with a fierce glower and then turns away.{/n} "I always survive."

traits.locale_text: « Chaque matin, je priais le Père de Tous, et chaque nuit, j'en appelais à Russ. J'ai entraîné mon corps, j'ai lu les litanies, et dans les moments les plus sombres, j'ai récité ma propre saga. Je me suis rappelé de chaque bataille, de chaque blessure, de chaque frère. Et c'est ce qui m'a permis de survivre. » {n}Le Space Wolf aux cheveux roux vous fixe d'un regard noir avant de se détourner.{/n} « Je survis à chaque fois. »

languages.original_text: "Every morning I made entreaties to the Allfather, and every night I appealed to Russ. I trained my body, read the litanies, and in the darkest moments, I recited my own saga. I recalled every battle, every wound, every brother. And that is how I survived." {n}The red-haired Space Wolf fixes you with a fierce glower and then turns away.{/n} "I always survive."

languages.text: "Her sabah Yücebaba'ya yalvardım, Russ'a seslendim. Bedenimi geliştirdim, ilahiler okudum ve en kötü anlarda kendi destanımı dillendirdim. Her bir savaşı, her bir yarayı, her bir kardeşimi anımsadım. Böyle sağ kaldım." {n}Kızıl saçlı Uzay Kurdu sana vahşi bir bakış atıp arkasını dönüyor.{/n} "Ben her zaman sağ kalırım."
languages.original_text: "Every morning I made entreaties to the Allfather, and every night I appealed to Russ. I trained my body, read the litanies, and in the darkest moments, I recited my own saga. I recalled every battle, every wound, every brother. And that is how I survived." {n}The red-haired Space Wolf fixes you with a fierce glower and then turns away.{/n} "I always survive."
